response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which holds immense value for us at $10,000. Given its significance and the fact that it's worth $10,000 to you, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is a unique chance to secure a high-quality item at a price that is just slightly above our cost, considering the market value. I look forward to your positive response. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 9500}
